task.name: asdmsummary
task.shortdescription: Summarized description of an ASDM dataset.
task.description: Given an ASDM directory, this task will print, to the CASA log, information about the content of the dataset contained in that directory (down to the level of a subscan).

param.name: asdm
param.description:
Name of input ASDM directory The asdmsummary task prints a description of the content of an SDM dataset to the CASA logger.
Example: asdm='10C-119_sb3070258_1.55628.42186299768'

task.example:
For more information, see the task pages of asdmsummary in CASA Docs:
https://casa.nrao.edu/casadocs/
